text: Trachysma is a genus of sea snails, marine gastropod molluscs in the family Pendromidae. ==Species== Species within the genus Trachysma include: * Trachysma ignobile Thiele, 1912 * Trachysma antarctica Numanami, 1996 * Trachysma tenue Thiele, 1912 ==References== Category:Pendromidae
title: Trachysma
